modules.description: Provides functions to compress and decompress strings using zlib, with control over compression level, header inclusion, and maximum decompression size. Works with strings and custom error types representing zlib-specific issues. Used to safely handle compressed data streams, ensuring size limits are enforced during decompression.

Provides functions to compress and decompress strings using zlib and gzip formats. Operates on OCaml strings and returns compressed or decompressed string results. Enables efficient handling of text data in web protocols or file formats requiring compression.

Encodes and decodes strings using zlib with customizable compression settings and strict size enforcement. Handles errors such as oversized decompression, format mismatches, and checksum failures through dedicated error types. Supports safe processing of compressed data by validating extracted content against source metadata. Can be used to verify integrity of compressed files or safely decompress untrusted data streams.
